meanings.definition: Relating to a sector or sectors.
meanings.sent1: The company focused on sectoral growth in the technology industry.
meanings.sent2: The sectoral analysis showed promising trends in the market.
meanings.sent3: The sectoral squirrel organized its nuts by industry type.
meanings.sent4: Her sectoral vision allowed her to see opportunities others missed.
meanings.sent5: The sectoral approach helped streamline operations and increase efficiency.

meanings.sent1: The sectoral map displayed the different zones clearly.
meanings.sent2: The sectoral division of the city made navigation easier.
meanings.sent3: The sectoral cake was cut into equal slices for everyone.
meanings.sent4: His sectoral mind could compartmentalize tasks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The sectoral layout of the garden maximized sunlight for each plant.

meanings.sent1: The sectoral policy aimed to benefit multiple industries.
meanings.sent2: The sectoral impact of the new law was significant.
meanings.sent3: The sectoral party brought together workers from various fields.
meanings.sent4: Her sectoral influence reached far beyond her initial sector.
meanings.sent5: The sectoral approach considered the needs of all sectors involved.
